nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 44

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 44 is the forty-fourth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with components for the internal structure of the left leg of the buildable R2-D2.
